short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search and navigate bookmarks by title, domain with a simple command palette interface.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search and navigate bookmarks by title and domain using a simple command palette interface. Click on the extension icon or use the keyboard shortcut Alt + B (Option + B on Mac) to open the search palette.

Key features:
🔍 Search bookmarks by title and domain  
🥪 Includes favicon and folder information  
🔤 Always ready for input  
🚀 Easy to navigate, mouse-free  
🌙 Light / Dark mode

Shortcut can be customized from chrome://extensions/shortcuts if needed.
